column1: #Text=Perhaps I can impart some advice to the young ladies who stayed up expecting to see a female President.
#Text=This is the strength of democracy reiterating the importance of the difference of opinion.
#Text=You have been delivered an early lesson in life that your parents are not perfect.
#Text=The more important messages, lost on your parents, comes from baseball, and a certainty of life.
#Text=And from a band,  'You can't always get what you want'.
